alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:31AM CDT until August 28 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farmland along the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 19.5 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 15.6 Wed 8 am CDT 18.7 19.3 19.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CDT.
